concept.title: Cache
concept.shortdesc: The Hive Metadata processor queries Hive for information and caches the results. When possible, it uses the cache for record comparison to avoid unnecessary Hive queries.

conbody.p:
Hive Metadata processorcachecachefor the Hive Metadata processorThe processor caches the following Hive metadata:
Database and table to be written to
Hive table properties
Column names and data types in the table
Avro schema
Partition values
